name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a component-based architecture and virtual DOM.

name: Next.js
description: The React framework for production. Hybrid static & server rendering, TypeScript support, smart bundling.

name: Vite
description: Next generation frontend tooling. Lightning fast HMR and optimized build with Rollup.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces without leaving your HTML.

name: TypeScript
description: Typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JS. Adds optional static typing and class-based OOP.

name: Prisma
description: Next-generation ORM for Node.js and TypeScript. Type-safe database client with auto-generated queries.

name: Drizzle ORM
description: TypeScript ORM that is lightweight, performant, and type-safe with zero dependencies.

name: tRPC
description: End-to-end typesafe APIs. Build fully typesafe APIs without schemas or code generation.

name: Zustand
description: Small, fast and scalable state management. Simplified flux principles with hooks-based API.

name: Zod
description: TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference. Parse, don't validate.

name: Shadcn UI
description: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS. Copy and paste into your apps.

name: Framer Motion
description: A production-ready motion library for React. Declarative animations and gestures.

name: Express
description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js. The de facto standard server framework.

name: Hono
description: Ultrafast web framework for the Edges. Works on Cloudflare Workers, Deno, Bun, and Node.js.

name: Playwright
description: Reliable end-to-end testing for modern web apps. Cross-browser, cross-platform, cross-language.

name: Vitest
description: A blazing fast unit test framework powered by Vite. Jest-compatible with native ESM support.

name: ESLint
description: Find and fix problems in your JavaScript code. Pluggable linting utility for JS and JSX.

name: Prettier
description: An opinionated code formatter. Supports many languages and integrates with most editors.

name: Docker
description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers for consistent environments.

name: Turborepo
description: High-performance build system for JavaScript and TypeScript monorepos with intelligent caching.

name: SWR
description: React hooks for data fetching. Stale-while-revalidate strategy for fast, lightweight data sync.

name: TanStack Query
description: Powerful asynchronous state management for TS/JS. Caching, background updates, and stale data handling.

name: Astro
description: The web framework for content-driven websites. Ship zero JavaScript by default with island architecture.

name: Svelte
description: A radical new approach to building user interfaces. Compiles components to efficient imperative code.

name: Redis
description: In-memory data structure store used as database, cache, message broker, and streaming engine.

name: Supabase
description: The open source Firebase alternative. Instant APIs, auth, realtime, storage, and edge functions.

name: Auth.js
description: Authentication for the web. Runtime agnostic, supports OAuth, email, and credentials providers.

name: Three.js
description: JavaScript 3D library. Create and display animated 3D computer graphics in a web browser.

name: D3.js
description: Data-Driven Documents. Bring data to life with SVG, Canvas and HTML visualizations.

name: Bun
description: Incredibly fast JavaScript runtime, bundler, test runner, and package manager. All in one.

name: pnpm
description: Fast, disk space efficient package manager. Strict node_modules with content-addressable storage.
